article.title: THEI Receives Best Distributor Award Again in 2025

content.text: For the second consecutive time, THEI is proud to receive the prestigious award as the Best National Distributor of 2025. This award is a testament to our dedication in providing the best services and solutions to all our customers in Indonesia.
A Result of Commitment and Hard Work

This achievement would not have been possible without the hard work of the entire THEI team and the invaluable trust of our customers and business partners. This award motivates us to continue innovating and raising our service standards across all lines, from sales and service to after-sales.

content.alt: Director of THEI with the award

content.text: We thank you for your support. Looking ahead, THEI will remain committed to being a reliable partner that not only provides quality products but also comprehensive solutions that drive your business success. Together, we will continue to build Indonesia.
